turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Bud, I want to get a pizza from Otto's for us for lunch.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sweet, sounds good what are you thinking?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like the potato bacon pizza, does that work for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely, but I don't really like the scallions that come on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine. I'm going over that way in a little bit can you get right on ordering?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Better get a large, how big is it again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Large is 16".

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, that will be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right I'm going to order the potato bacon scallion, hold the scallion, for pick up ASAP, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, see if they can put extra bacon on there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You bet.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have them put it on the business account ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me know when you are done and I will head out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, that is going to be 22 bucks, do you want to include a tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, give them $5.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, they said it will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank, you. See you at lunch. They are going to text you the bill.
